verses.verse: I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H376>behold,<s%> a man with a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>asked,<s%> "Where are you <S%H1980>going?<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4058>me,<s%> "To measure <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> and what is its <S%H753>length.<s%>"
<S%H4397>Behold,<s%> the angel who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4397>angel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to meet <S%H7125>him,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7323>him,<s%> "Run, <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H1975>this<s%> young <S%H5288>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3389><s%> 'Jerusalem will be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> as villages without <S%H6519>walls,<s%> because of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H929>livestock<s%> in <S%H8432>it.<s%>
For <S%H5002>I,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2346><s%> 'will be to her a wall of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3519>it,<s%> and I will be the glory in the midst of <S%H8432>her.<s%>

<S%H1945>Come!<s%> <S%H1945>Come!<s%> <S%H5127>Flee<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H6566><s%> 'for I have spread you abroad as the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H310><s%> 'For <S%H3519>honor<s%> he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7997>plundered<s%> <S%H5060>you;<s%> for he who touches you <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H892>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

<S%H5130>For,<s%> behold, I will shake my <S%H3027>hand<s%> over <S%H7998>them,<s%> and they will be a spoil to those who <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3045>them;<s%> and you will know that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has sent <S%H7971>me.<s%>

<S%H7442>Sing<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H935>for,<s%> behold, I come, and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H5002>you,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and shall be my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>you,<s%> and you shall know that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has sent me to <S%H7971>you.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as his <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>land,<s%> and will again <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
Be <S%H2013>silent,<s%> all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for he has <S%H5782>roused<s%> himself from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation!<s%>"
